skills.name: Formless
skills.description: [SP: 0][CD: 20s] Wielder gains 2 stacks of Mind Mark. Combo ATK consumes 1 stack on hit to restore 15 bonus SP. CD: 2s.

skills.name: Mindless
skills.description: Boosts Crit Rate by 15.0%. In Herrscher form, wielder deals 20.0% bonus Physical DMG.

skills.name: Senseless
skills.description: While wielder is on standby, team deals 15.0% bonus Physical DMG (Lingering Thought and Senseless cannot stack).
